Description: This session will involve review of the latest molecular advances and current understanding of the biology of B cell and T cell lymphomas. Lectures will include new insights gained from next generation sequencing and spatial -omics analysis of these diseases. Dr. Novak will discuss key findings from recent next generation sequencing studies in aggressive B-cell lymphomas and their potential implications. Dr. Lim will cover molecular studies and advances in T-cell lymphomas. Dr. Flowers will describe how new sequencing data and approaches can be integrated into the care of patients and utilized to advances clinical trials for B-cell and T-cell lymphomas.
SearchResultBody: AOS12. Integrating Genomics into Clinical Advances in Lymphoma
Title: Integrating Genomics into Clinical Advances in Lymphoma
